effect.sun_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to burn the target. User charges for one turn before attacking.

short_effect.sun_moon: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Requires a turn to charge before attacking. Has a 30% chance to burn the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: On the second turn, an ultracold, freezing wind surrounds the target. This may leave the target with a burn.
